data.title: The Murder of Brittany Booker by Black Girls Talk Crime
data.meta_description: 30 year old Brittany Booker was an amazing mother, raising 6 children when she would help her friend leave an abusive relationship. However, Brittany would soon be attacked viciously by this friends ex. Although she lived, this man would go on the run and would months later on return to kidnap and murder Brittany.
data.text:
One hot summer day in 2001 two young sisters aged 10 & 3 go missing from their Chicago home. While a note left behind and a voicemail on their mothers cellphone may hold the keys to their disappearance they also hold more questions than answers. 23 years later the case remains unsolved with no leads or suspects, but that doesn’t mean the public doesn’t have their own suspicions on who did it.

A rising rap star would be on her way to making noise in the music industry when her dreams would be tragically cut short in a brutal murder in her beloved city.

A young girl escapes turmoil in her home country just to settle in the US where she feels safe, unfortunately she will soon learn that there are devils everywhere.

Antionetta is a God fearing woman who has loved God and been devoted to the church her entire life. After hearing heart breaking news she prays for a man that will love God and still accept her the way she is. She thinks she has found the one when she rekindles with an old crush but she soon finds out the devil hides well in sheep’s clothing. What happened to Antionetta?

Elisa Izquierdo was considered the Cinderella of New York City in 1995. She was born to a crack addicted mother but was given to her father who loved and adored her. She spent the first 5 years of her life with her proud father until tragedy struck and she was handed back to her mother. A year later Elisa would be dead. What happened to this beautiful angel and what monster ended her life before it could truly begin?

19 year old Steen Fenrich is a gay African American man living in the 1990’s at a time where our country has not yet gained tolerance for the LGBTQ community. When he goes missing no one reports him missing but after a long 6 months a gruesome discovery is made. Was Steen killed because of his sexual orientation? And who would dispose of his body in such a brutal way?

27 year old Rannita Williams is a mom and businesswoman who finds herself involved in a open relationship as well as in an internet war with the other woman. This internet war would soon gain the attention of hundreds and a live video would shock all those that saw it with deadly consequences.

30 year old Brittany Booker was an amazing mother, raising 6 children when she would help her friend leave an abusive relationship. However, Brittany would soon be attacked viciously by this friends ex. Although she lived, this man would go on the run and would months later on return to kidnap and murder Brittany.

26 year old Za’zell Preston is a mother of three and a college student chasing her dreams while trying to get away from an abusive husband. Just when she’s on her way out of the marriage her children witness the horrifying murder of their mother. But what’s done after her murder, on Christmas Day is the unthinkable and something only a monster would do.

On a rainy day in the Fall of 1994 an entire family is almost completely wiped out in their apartment. Their 14 year old pregnant daughter saves her younger sister’s life as well as her own after being shot multiple times and playing dead. The community is outraged at the murders and the killer goes on the run. Police with the help of the FBI start a frantic one month search to find who did this and why.

26 year old Desiree would travel from New York to her family’s hotel in Jamaica in order to take some time to herself as well as work. While there she would make friends with a lot of the locals, however one night while making a quick trip out to meet someone Desiree would vanish. Her body would be found the next day. She was dead and whoever killed her killed her in such a vicious way. What happened to Desiree?

27 year old Keishla is young, beautiful and living her life when finds herself caught in an love affair with a man that she’s known since their childhood. The only problem? This man is married and famous. When Keishla discovers she’s pregnant not everyone is happy and she soon goes missing. What happened to Keishla Rodriguez?

A 14 year old girl would tragically be fatally shot after a physical fight that first started off as a Facebook argument. The teen who shot her would be handed the gun by an adult very close to her, instead of breaking up the fight they would help murder a young girl with her whole life ahead of her.

13 year old Alexandra, called Alex for short was a typical teenage girl. She loved to play soccer and loved animals. She would go missing in August of 2005 from her Indiana home and her body would be found soon after in Chicago. When police asked Alex’s mother if she knew anyone who would do this to her daughter she gave the name of someone very close to their family who previously stalked the girl.

A fathers job is to always protect their children, and that’s exactly was 39 year old father Luis Marrero always did for his daughter Jalia, including the night he was murdered by her abusive ex boyfriend. Jalia, who was the only witness would soon go missing and later on be found deceased only a month after her fathers murder.

18 year old Nia would be traveling home with two of her sisters after a family gathering on a public train when they would unknowingly and unprovoked be stabbed by a madman. Nia would die on the platform while her sisters rendered aid to her. Nia’s story is a story of white supremacy showing it’s ugly face in a country that for far too long has turned a blind eye to racial violence.

While visiting her sons gravesite on his birthday just months after his death his mother would meet a devastating and unimaginable fate at the cemetery, one that we could only imagine happening in the movies.

21 year old Destiny Harrison was living out her dreams, having just welcomed a baby girl and becoming a mom she had just opened her beauty salon in her neighborhood when she would be robbed and assaulted by two assailants, after reporting the altercation Destiny would be killed 12 days later in front of her baby. Let’s tell Destiny’s unsolved story.

Three young boys would be abducted in New York City within months in 1989, two from the same exact playground in the same exact housing complex in Harlem, New York. The thirds mother would soon be found murdered in Brooklyn. However he nor the other two boys would ever be found. Are these three abductions connected? What happened to these three boys?

This devastating case tells the story of 13 year old Alezauna “Libby” Carter, a bright young girl with her whole life ahead of her who would go missing in the Fall of 2020. Alezauna’s body would be found 6 months later in an abandoned house. What happened to her? And why?

17 year old Jalajhia Finklea would go missing from her home one day before her 18th birthday. The teen was 20 weeks pregnant and had a doctors appointment the day she went missing that she missed. Her mother knew she would never miss this appointment. Something was very wrong. And the perpetrator was closer to the family than they would ever think.

A woman shows up to a local hospital alone with multiple gunshot wounds to her body. While hospital staff tries their hardest to save the woman’s life she would succumb to her injuries. Who would want to kill 35 year old Tianja Duff and why?

23 year old Arieuna Reed has a tumultuous relationship with her sons father but decided for the sake of her son to coparent with him. While dropping their child off with his dad the unthinkable would happen and Arieuna would absolutely not see it coming.

34 year old Julii Johnson is young, beautiful, full of life and enjoying her relationship with her boyfriend Jim when she in gunned down in his driveway in the early hours. Who would want to kill Julii and why?

14 year old Henny Scott is found dead on her reservation 21 days after she goes missing. Her body has signs of a struggle, but her case is closed as law enforcement says she died due to hypothermia. What really happened to Henny?

19 year old Miya Marcano would go missing from her apartment complex on September 24, 2021. 8 days later her body would be found. The suspect would commit suicide without answering for his crimes, but police would piece together what happened to Miya the evening she disappeared from her home.

17 year old transgender girl Brayla Stone who is described as being the life of the party is found dead with a gunshot wound to her head in the Summer of 2020. Police wonder who would want to kill someone so young with so much life to live and why? Today we tell her story.

Straight A student 19 year old Keonte Chavis has her whole life ahead of her, and is excited to join the Air Force after graduating high school in 2012. Her life is tragically cut short by someone no one would ever suspect of harming her. Who is responsible for killing such a bright girl and why?

35 year old Atlanta model and actress Jokisha Brown was making waves on the Atlanta rap scene. Even starring in a few films. In April of 2016 Jokisha would be kidnapped and raped. She would escape this attack and go to police. Just to be murdered, shot to death while in her car, a day before her birthday in July of that same year. This case is officially unsolved but the cops have a prime suspect. Let’s dive into this beauty’s story.

18 year old Latisha Frazier was reported missing after failing to come home after her work shift. 5 months later her family began receiving disturbing messages on social media saying Latisha was murdered. No one would believe what happened to Latisha in August of 2010 and who had done it.
